text: Se iroyin awon t’o siwaju won ko ti i de ba won ni? (Iroyin) ijo (Anabi) Nuh, iran ‘Ad, iran Thamud, ijo (Anabi) ’Ibrohim, awon ara Modyan ati awon ilu ti A doju re bole (ijo Anabi Lut); awon Ojise won wa ba won pelu awon eri t’o yanju. Nitori naa, Allahu ko se abosi si won, sugbon emi ara won ni won sabosi si
